description.raw: The HDF5_INSTRUMENT option has been broken (issue #1841 and [gazebo_tutorials issue 40](#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/issues/40/hdf-5-tutorial)). From my testing, the feature worked when it was originally merged in pull request #1523, but that pull request caused a bunch of jenkins builds to break, so we merged pull request #1644 that fixed the jenkins builds. Unfortunately, we removed a [a line](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/1644/fix-jenkins-build-error/diff#Ldeps/opende/CMakeLists.txtF271) that linked with `hdf5_cpp` that I believe causes the linker errors in #1841. Specifying the `CXX` component when finding HDF5 causes this library to be included in the `HDF5_LIBRARIES` cmake variable and fixes the linking error.
description.html: The HDF5_INSTRUMENT option has been broken (issue #1841 and gazebo_tutorials issue 40). From my testing, the feature worked when it was originally merged in pull request #1523, but that pull request caused a bunch of jenkins builds to break, so we merged pull request #1644 that fixed the jenkins builds. Unfortunately, we removed a a line that linked with hdf5_cpp that I believe causes the linker errors in #1841. Specifying the CXX component when finding HDF5 causes this library to be included in the HDF5_LIBRARIES cmake variable and fixes the linking error.

title.raw: Fix finding HDF5 for use in ODE data logging (#1841)
title.html: Fix finding HDF5 for use in ODE data logging (#1841)
